Title: Correction to: Raised Serum IL-8 Levels Are Associated with Excessive Fatigue in Female Carriers of X-Linked Chronic Granulomatous Disease in the UK (Journal of Clinical Immunology, (2017), 37, 3, (279-281), 10.1007/s10875-017-0384-8)
Abstract: © 2018, Springer Science+Business Media, LLC, part of Springer Nature.The original version of the article, “Raised Serum IL-8 Levels Are Associated with Excessive Fatigue in Female Carriers of X-Linked Chronic Granulomatous Disease in the UK” incorrectly listed the name of the fourth author as Fai W. Ng. The correct spelling of the author’s name is WF Ng.
